member.name: M:DriverFinder.UI.Controllers.AuthControl.AuthController.RegisterUser(DriverFinder.Core.DTO.RegisterDTO.UserRegisterRequest)
member.summary: Registers a new user account using the specified registration details.
member.remarks: The registration request must provide valid user details. If the registration is successful, the user is automatically signed in. Validation errors or registration failures will result in an error response.
member.param: An object containing the user's registration information, including email, name, and phone number. Cannot be null.
member.returns: An that represents the result of the registration operation. Returns with the created user on success, or a problem response if registration fails.

member.name: M:DriverFinder.UI.Controllers.AuthControl.AuthController.Login(DriverFinder.Core.DTO.LoginDTO.LoginRequest)
member.summary: Attempts to authenticate a user with the provided login credentials.
member.param: An object containing the user's email address and password used for authentication. Must not be null and must contain valid values.
member.returns: An that represents the result of the login attempt. Returns with the authenticated user if successful; otherwise, returns a problem response describing the error.

member.name: M:DriverFinder.UI.Controllers.AuthControl.AuthController.SignOut
member.summary: Signs out the currently authenticated user and ends their session.
member.returns: A result indicating that the sign-out operation completed successfully. Returns a 204 No Content response.

member.summary: Updates the details of an existing driving school with the specified identifier.
member.param: The unique identifier of the driving school to update.
An object containing the updated details of the driving school. The property must match the parameter.

member.name: M:DriverFinder.UI.Controllers.DrivingSchoolControl.DrivingSchoolsController.ChangeFemaleInsStatus(System.Guid)
member.summary: Creates a new driving school or updates an existing one based on the provided information.
member.remarks: If the model state is invalid, the method returns a problem response with validation error messages. If the operation fails to add or update the driving school, a problem response is returned. On success, an HTTP 200 OK response is returned with a confirmation message.
member.param: The driving school entity to create or update. Must contain valid data; otherwise, the request will fail validation.
member.returns: An ActionResult containing the created or updated DrivingSchool entity if successful; otherwise, a problem response describing the error.

member.summary: Applies a JSON Patch document to an existing driving school resource.
member.param: The unique identifier of the driving school to update.
The JSON Patch document containing the set of operations to apply to the driving school.
member.returns: An that represents the result of the operation. Returns with the updated driving school if successful; otherwise, returns a problem response if the school does not exist or if the patch results in validation errors.
member.summary: Deletes the driving school with the specified unique identifier.
member.param: The unique identifier of the driving school to delete.
member.returns: An indicating the result of the delete operation. Returns if the driving school does not exist; if the deletion is successful; or with an error if the deletion fails.
